src:
Slovenska zlata zrna, Golden State ob Curryja
Harden v ligi NBA zadeval, šok za bojevnike. Vlatko Čančar le zaigral za Denver Nuggets.
02 Nov 2019, 06:20 by Š. R.
NEW YORK – Košarkarji Miami Heat so v ligi NBA na gostovanju pri Atlanta Hawks osvojili še drugo zmago nad tem moštvom v treh dneh. Tokrat je vročica slavila s 106:97, slovenski košarkar Goran Dragić pa je prispeval štiri točke, skok in tri podaje. Na tekmi v Atlanti se je spet izkazal novinec vročice Kendrick Nunn, ki je z 28 točkami dosegel svoj strelski rekord kariere, skupno pa je na prvih petih tekmah v NBA dosegel 112 točk, kar je največ v zgodovini lige med vsemi igralci, ki jih niso izbrali na naboru NBA. Klubi iz elitne lige pa so ga sprva prezrli zaradi disciplinskega prekrška, še ko je bil član univerze Illinois. "To je po svoje kar neverjetno," je dejal Nunn za svoj uvod v NBA in dodal: "Vse, kar sem potreboval, je bila priložnost."Prvenec v NBA je dočakal tudi Vlatko Čančar v dresu Denver Nuggets, a mu je trener zlatih zrn Michael Malone, ekipa je s 107:122 izgubila na gostovanju pri New Orleans Pelicans, namenil le dve minuti, tako da je njegova statistika ostala prazna.
Gara vsak dan
James Harden pa se strelsko prebuja. Superzvezdnik lige NBA je po slabših predstavah na prvih dveh tekmah na zadnjih dveh dosegel skoraj 100 točk, vključno z 59 za zmago njegovega Houstona s 159:158 proti Washingtonu. Najboljši strelec lige pretekle sezone je sezono začel s poraznim metom, saj je na uvodnih treh tekmah zadel le 28,9 odstotka svojih poskusov iz igre. To je bilo pozabljeno, ko je na svoji 19. tekmi s 50 točkami ali več Harden zadel 18 od 32 metov in zgrešil le enega od 18 prostih metov. "Včasih lahko narediš vse prav in se zadeve ne izidejo, kot si pričakoval. Garam vsak dan. Zaljubil sem se v to, da nenehno izboljšujem svojo igro," je dejal Harden. Odmevala je tudi poškodba nosilca igre Golden State Warriors Stephena Curryja. Ta si je ob padcu med prodorom na koš na domači tekmi proti Phoenix Suns zlomil levo zapestje. Ni še jasno, koliko tekem bo moral počivati, a za podprvake iz San Francisca postajajo obeti za to sezono po odhodu Kevina Duranta vse slabši. Še en udarec jim je zadal Phoenix, ki je na koncu zmagal s 121:110.
text:
Slovenian Golden Grains, Golden State by Curry
Harden in the NBA League concerned, shock for the Warriors. Vlatko Cancar only played for the Denver Nuggets.
02 Nov 2019, 06:20 by Š. R.
NEW YORK - The Miami Heat have their second NBA win over the NBA in three days in the NBA. This time the fever was celebrated with 106: 97, and Slovenian basketball player Goran Dragic contributed four points, a jump and three passes. Atlanta fielder Kendrick Nunn turned up 28 points with his career-high scoring record, scoring 112 points in his first five NBA games, the highest in league history among all non-league players picked on the NBA set. Elite league clubs, however, initially overlooked him for a disciplinary offense when he was a member of the University of Illinois. "This is unbelievable in its own right," Nunn said of his introduction to the NBA, adding, "All I needed was an opportunity." The NBA debut was also welcomed by Vlatko Cancar in the Denver Nuggets jersey, but was coached by the Golds grain Michael Malone, the team lost by 107: 122 to the New Orleans Pelicans, only devoted two minutes, leaving his stats empty.
Garage every day
James Harden, however, is waking up. The NBA league superstar has scored nearly 100 points in his first two games in his last two games, including 59 to win his Houston 159- 158 win over Washington. The league's top scorer last season started the season with a losing throw, hitting just 28.9 percent of his field goal attempts in the opening three games. That was forgotten when, in his 19th game with 50 points or more, Harden hit 18 of 32 shots and missed only one of 18 free throws. "Sometimes you can do everything right and things don't work out as you expected. I guarantee everyday. I fell in love with the fact that I'm constantly improving my game," Harden said. She also echoed injury to Golden State Warriors carrier Stephen Curry. He broke his left wrist while falling into the basket at a home game against the Phoenix Suns. It's not yet clear how many matches he will need to rest, but prospects for the San Francisco seed are getting worse for this season after Kevin Durant's departure. Another blow was given to them by Phoenix, who eventually won 121-110.
